call_to_action_text: MielProje we offer the best livable conditions for you and your loved ones.
about_context:
Istanbul for one thousand six hundred years, from 330 to 1922; It is a city that has been the capital of 4 different empires and has been the subject of poems.
This city, which hosts many cultures and carries history, art and history in its heart, is also one of the largest metropolises in the world.
Miel Proje Pazarlama brings you together with the right investments in the heart of this unique city, in locations where you can experience the real Istanbul.
Miel Proje Pazarlama, which aims to be a strong and reliable partner with its customers and collaborators with independent solutions by bringing together innovative solutions in our constantly renewed sector with its experience, set out with the mission of increasing customer satisfaction, providing economical solutions, and bringing the buyers together at real prices with the right investment. coming out.
poem:
I looked at you from a hill yesterday, dear Istanbul!
I have not seen anywhere I have not traveled, anywhere I have not loved.
As long as I live, sit on the throne of my heart!
Loving just one of your neighborhoods is worth a lifetime.

There are many glittering cities in the world,
But you are the creator of enchanted beauties.
I say he's lived the most pleasant and longest dream
Who lived many years in you, died in you, slept in you

 Yahya Kemal Beyatlı
